snippet: At least 16 people were killed and 30 injured in a collision between a freight train and a bus on a highway in northern Mexico on Friday.
abstract: Freight train and bus collide in northern Mexico, killing at least 16 people and injuring 30.
lead_paragraph: At least 16 people were killed and 30 injured in a collision between a freight train and a bus on a highway in northern Mexico on Friday.

headline.main: Mexico: At Least 16 Killed in Collision
headline.print_headline: Mexico: At Least 16 Killed in Collision
